snippet: The group, Ansaru, said the foreigners, who were kidnapped from a construction company’s compound in February, were killed to prevent rescue attempts.
lead_paragraph: The group, Ansaru, said the foreigners, who were kidnapped from a construction company’s compound in February, were killed to prevent rescue attempts.

headline.main: Extremist Group in Nigeria Says It Killed 7 Foreign Hostages
headline.print_headline: Extremist Group in Nigeria Says It Killed 7 Foreign Hostages
